attributes.title: Please end this horrible app❗️❗️
attributes.review:
I fee traumatized, I downloaded the app, decided to go to sleep but right before I could my entire phone started to make weird notification noises. I put my phone under my pillow and ignored it, when all of a sudden, I heard “trump 2020”.like what the heck is that?
Since then I’ve been hearing that and those notification sounds and I’m about to take a trip to the doctor and get anti hallucinogens because I swear I see Donald trump in the back of my eye now. It’s getting worse everyday so please don’t download This app.

attributes.title: This app gave me to much sause
attributes.review: I thought I could get some swag. But I didn’t know I’d get this much clout. Literally after posting that I down loaded this app so many people where jumping in my DMs and I was getting so much attention. The issue is, I didn’t think I’d get this much clout. So many people want to talk to me now that I don’t even have time to do anything on my phone with out getting a notification. How else am I going to tell my grandma’s brother’s uncle’s college roommate how to properly apply HEADON if every 15 seconds I’m getting a notification.

this app took forever to download. it literally felt like years. after i finally got the app, it hacked all my info and i later got a text, call, and email about the “make america great again” hat that “i supposedly ordered” (I DIDN’T). i got several notifications from the app that i didn’t even care about all at once and my phone wouldn’t shut up. not to mention, tik toks getting banned and american children’s social lives and depression are gonna get TERRIBLE. i am no longer a trump supporter and will never be ever again.

attributes.title: What!?😤
attributes.review: This app is terrible, I downloaded this to see what he was doing to “make America great again” and it asked a bunch of personal questions! I answered one and had my email spammed, then I unsubscribed from it on my e mail and the app made my screen go black with one single option, resubscribe. I didn’t and my phone stayed like that until it died, I charged it and it was back to normal but I deleted the app and my email is fine, this is a warning to all of you. Plus my work got a ton of letters saying vote for trump right after.

attributes.title: Awful
attributes.review: I can’t believe this! When I downloaded it, my phone screen blanked out and went back to the home screen. That is a major bug that needs to be fixed, I don’t even think this app should still be up. When I tried to go back into the app, I noticed that all of my other apps where gone and that my home screen had turned black! I have no pictures, contacts, anything!!! My entire sim card got wiped and i’m so angry about it. I can’t contact everyone that I once could. DONT DOWNLOAD THIS, IT COULD HAPPEN TO YOUR PHONE TOO!!

attributes.title: I am disappointed and disgusted😤🤮
attributes.review: I tried to download this app to try and support this nasty bag of beans and it took almost three month to download and then when I opened it I made an account and it hacked into my Gmail account and said if I didn’t buy MAGA merchandise I would get the FBI sent to my house and then the app crashed my entire phone then I had to go to the Apple store and buy a new one this app is so disgusting and irritating 😠 I do not recommend it at all Trump shouldn’t have an app if he’s going to do this on his app. End of the story.😤😡🤬

attributes.title: This app is horrible
attributes.review: When I first open the app I am mediately can I add I couldn’t see any campaigns or stuff like that everything was blurry and made my phone crash don’t get this app horrible it will glitch or phone and I will delete all your information once I open the app again the next day I want to see all the new things but then it brought me straight to a different website I don’t recommend this app please do not get it if you do you you were crazy and please just not get this app revenge Trump revenge

attributes.title: Brain cells died
attributes.review: Before I downloaded this app I could think logically for myself. Right after I downloaded It I started to think illogically by not wearing a face mask out in public and thinking Trump was the most brilliant person ever. My closest friends noticed and asked what I had been doing differently and I realized everything happened right after I downloaded this app. It will kill your brain cells and turn you into a stupid noodle. Save yourselves and never download this app. Read a history book and learn about all the wrongs of America. THIS IS THE WORST APP EVER! WEAR A FREAKING MASK!

attributes.title: I wish this had the option of ZERO STARS
attributes.review:
this app is so bad when you download the app it immediately asks for your phone number. Another thing is that before I got the app my phone was just fine and after I got it my phone was just glitching turning off by itself and it gave my phone a virus forcing me to get a new phone and waste money making me lose my memory. This app is HORRIBLE so don’t download it 
She💁🏼‍♀️like🌂Papî 🍰I 🍾adore 💘you🤸‍♀️I'm 🛍like 🩸Baby ✨i 😻 ain’t 💅normal👩‍🦯 Rrrrr 🦁 🦁🦁 four in her 💞 four in her  💞 four in her 

also Barbz for life 😻💅🏽💍

attributes.title: Takes personal data
attributes.review: I am appalled. This app has so many red flags. The app forces you to put in your phone number and steals ur personal information. The app is also trying to spread negativity, and I’m not here for that. Like this app makes me quake in terror, I cannot BELIEVE IT WANTS MY PHONE NUMBER. How dare they do this to us? Once we put in our phone numbers, our numbers are released into the vast world of media and anyone can call us! Wow, this lack of privacy, along with all the other red flags shouldn’t allow this app on the AppStore. It’s too dangerous to innocent civilians.
